name: Quadracell MX
description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 3
Grade: A 
Class: Military
Aegis engineers set out to create a power plant that could deliver the performance and durability needed during prolonged engagements. The Quadracell MX was the result. This large power plant received years of strenuous field testing before finally becoming available to the public.
description_cn:
物品类型：发电机
制造商：圣盾动力(Aegis Dynamics)
尺寸：3
等级：A
类别：军用
圣盾工程师开始着手创建一个能够在长期交战期间提供所需的性能和耐久性的发电机.结果就是四相电池MX。这款大型发电机经过多年苛刻的实地测试,最终才向公众公开售卖。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-OmegaPro
